trans-unit.source: Provides the implementation for the metadata publishing protocols.
trans-unit.target: 提供元数据发布协议的实现。

trans-unit.source: The ServiceMetadataExtension is configured and used by configuring a service with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 配置和使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>配置服务使用 ServiceMetadataExtension

trans-unit.source: You can also use the ServiceMetadataExtension class to get the service's metadata at runtime by accessing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataExtension.Metadata%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用 ServiceMetadataExtension 类在运行时获取服务的元数据，通过访问<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataExtension.Metadata%2A>属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataExtension.Metadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceMetadataExtension"></xref> object.
Gets the service's metadata at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时获取服务的元数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> object that contains the service's metadata at runtime.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>对象，其中包含在运行时的服务的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the returned collection are reflected in subsequent requests for the service metadata.
trans-unit.target: 返回集合中的更改会反映在服务元数据的后续请求。

trans-unit.source: Gets the single WSDL used by the service.
trans-unit.target: 获取服务使用的单个 WSDL。

trans-unit.source: The single WSDL used by the service.
